DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study conduct multiple site determine activity , safety , tolerability XL999 give weekly patient metastatic colorectal cancer ( CRC ) . XL999 small molecule inhibitor multiple kinase include VEGFR , PDGFR , FGFR , FLT-3 , Src , involve tumor cell growth , formation new blood vessel ( angiogenesis ) , metastasis .
DOC.brief_title: Study XL999 Patients With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Males female histologically confirm metastatic colorectal cancer Measurable disease accord Response Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) At least 1 prior therapeutic regimen ( chemotherapy biologic ) ECOG performance status 0 1 Life expectancy ≥3 month Adequate organ marrow function No malignancy within 5 year Signed informed consent Radiation ≥25 % bone marrow within 30 day XL999 treatment Treatment systemic anticancer therapy within 30 day XL999 treatment Subject recover ≤ grade 1 within 10 % baseline adverse event due medication administer > 30 day prior study enrollment History know brain metastasis , current spinal cord compression , carcinomatous meningitis Uncontrolled and/or intercurrent illness Pregnant breastfeeding female Known HIV
